content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Emilia. The monthly rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable, but I assure you that it will be in line with the current market rates for similar properties in the area. What is your budget for rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 1000 Euros per month. Can you tell me the price that you propose?

Mister Heine:

I propose a monthly rental price of 950 Euros. This includes utilities such as electricity, water, and gas. It also includes maintenance and repairs for the building and apartment. However, please note that this is the final price and cannot be negotiated further.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your proposal, Mister Heine. While I appreciate the inclusion of utilities and maintenance, I am afraid that 950 Euros per month is outside of my budget. I would need to offer a lower rental price in order to make it work for me. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I'm sorry, but the apartment is already rented out. We don't have any other available properties at the moment. I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. If you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help you with, feel free to ask.

Mister Heine:

Thank you for your understanding, Emilia. I appreciate your interest in our properties and I hope to be able to assist you with your future housing needs. Have a great day!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your help, Mister Heine. I understand that the apartment is already rented out, and I appreciate your honesty and professionalism. If I have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help you with, please don't hesitate to let me know. Have a great day too!
name: Heinrich Heine
